```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Characteristics of H3N2 polymerase GISAID entries

```{r}
seq_times <- seq_times <- readRDS("../data/seq_times_091122.rda")


p <- ggplot(seq_times, aes(x = date)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "#939598", alpha = 0.5) +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab("Number of sequences") +
  labs(subtitle = "Distribution of complete H3N2 polymerase sequences in GISAID") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(text = element_text(size = 12))

p

ggsave("../Figures/pol_distribution.pdf", p, device = "pdf",
       height = 3, width = 6)

```
